rules.name: UpdateAccountOnContact
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ((2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7) OR 8) AND 9
rules.label: Update Account on Contact

formulas.name: form_Error
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Account__c}),ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Contact__c})),"No Account and Contact found", IF(AND(ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Account__c}),NOT(ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Contact__c}))),"No Account found", IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Account__c})),ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Contact__c})),"No Contact found","")))
